name: Merge Unicorn Evolution
description:
When these creatures are mutated into unicorn. The fun is happening.
I hope you have a wonderful day! Become part of the unicorn family.
Find out what happens when you put two identical unicorns together. WAIT they start evolve and become a new cool cute kawaii unicorn evolution.

Game features:
-Simple, intuitive and easy to use controls
-Easy, addictive and very challenging
-Fun to play and the best time pass as a leisure activity
-Simple, intuitive and instinctive graphics and gameplay
-Money , levels and Time to get you going
-40 different forms of Unicorns evolution
-A cool mix of idle tycoon and incremental clicker mix like Tamago!
-Hatching, take care of all your evolutions
-Challenge, compete with friends who Discover the next Evolution.

Collect profits and cash from your unicorn even and buy more unicorn from the shop. Complete challenging tasks, gain rewards and achievements. There is also a prestige feature to gain powerful bonuses.

Discover and unlock many types of cats. Complete achievements and gain rewards. Watch your condo grow to a big tower which is filled with toys all over.

You can play our game offline, i means in every town in the world and also while driving in the car. You can even hatch your own unicorn dragons

Become a master unicorn collector. What are you waiting. Download now!

We hope you enjoy our app! Always upgrade to the latest content and updates. If you like our app Give us live reviews and share your thoughts on how we work.
